import React, {Component} from 'react'; import Navbar from './Navbar'; import './About.css'; import profile from '../media/profile.jpeg'; class About extends Component { render() { return (

ABOUT ME

I'm an undergrad at UC Berkeley pursuing a double major in Computer Science and Statistics.

This spring I'll be working at Brankas as a software engineering intern.

In my free time I work out, play basketball, read, and spend time with friends. I've recently been following the crypto space and invested in NFT projects. I love to learn and work hard for the things that are worth it.

My resume, if you don't have it yet.

CONTACT ME

📩 marc.teoong@berkeley.edu

📞 +1 (510) 424 1808

); } } export default About;
